data.name: Project Space Hunter
data.detailed_description:
Play with your friends!


Project Space Hunter has an online mode to play with people from all over the world.
Create your own lobbies for you and your friends or join other lobbies from around the world.

Level Up!


Play Project Space Hunter to level up and unlock rewards.

Pay to Win? No, Thanks!


Earn boxes to unlock player skins, weapon skins, lobby backgrounds and much more, or buy boxes directly in the shop for real money. Because there are only cosmetic changes to the game and players, your game results and that of the other players will not be affected.

[h1]How will the game develop??[/h1]

We are currently working on the alpha version of the game which is constantly being updated. So you can look forward to more game content, weapons, maps and skins.
data.about_the_game:

[h1]How will the game develop??[/h1]

We are currently working on the alpha version of the game which is constantly being updated. So you can look forward to more game content, weapons, maps and skins.
data.short_description: Project Space Hunter is an online co-op multiplayer shooter by BBN.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-2320
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 555
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-8400
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 740
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
